name: URLAuthenticationChallenge
desc: A challenge from a server requiring authentication from the client.

items.name: init(authenticationChallenge: URLAuthenticationChallenge, sender: URLAuthenticationChallengeSender)
items.desc: Creates an authentication challenge from an existing challenge instance.

items.name: init(protectionSpace: URLProtectionSpace, proposedCredential: URLCredential?, previousFailureCount: Int, failureResponse: URLResponse?, error: Error?, sender: URLAuthenticationChallengeSender)
items.desc: Initializes an authentication challenge from parameters you provide.

items.name: var failureResponse: URLResponse?
items.desc: The URL response object representing the last authentication failure.

items.name: var previousFailureCount: Int
items.desc: The receiver’s count of failed authentication attempts.

items.name: var proposedCredential: URLCredential?
items.desc: The proposed credential for this challenge.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: The error object representing the last authentication failure.
